tasks.title: Create Life Event Object
tasks.description: Create the custom object 'Life_Event__c' with fields: Event_Name__c, Event_Date__c, and a lookup to Contact__c. Define sharing model as Private.
acceptance_criteria: Life_Event__c object is created with required fields
Sharing model is set to Private

tasks.title: Setup Email Notification Flow
tasks.description: Create a flow named 'Send_Life_Event_Email' to trigger an email notification to the associated contact when a new Life Event is created.
acceptance_criteria: Email notifications send correctly upon Life Event creation

tasks.title: Configure Security Settings for Life Event
tasks.description: Set profile permissions for the Life Event object to allow Read, Create, Edit, and Delete only to System Admin.
acceptance_criteria: Profile access is limited to System Admin
Other profiles have no access to Life_Event__c

tasks.title: Create Page Layout for Life Event
tasks.description: Design a user-friendly page layout for Life_Event__c that displays Event Name, Event Date, and related Contact fields.
acceptance_criteria: Page layout is created and saved

tasks.title: Perform Testing and Validation
tasks.description: Conduct testing of the entire implementation, ensuring object creation, flow functionality, security settings, and page layout operate as intended.
acceptance_criteria: All functional tests are completed successfully
Documentation of results and any issues is provided

key_risks: Potential security oversight in profile permissions
Incomplete testing leading to issues post-deployment
success_criteria: Life Event object is fully functional
All notifications are sent as expected
Users have appropriate access and can create Life Events
